title: Looking for a serif to compliment Benton Sans and Berthold City
content:
Hi,

I’m currently working on a design for a Danish magazine on running. I’m using Berthold City bold set in caps for some various headings and [Benton Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20091003024010/http:/www.fontbureau.com/fonts/BentonSans) as my main grotesque. For the feature stories (body copy) and for some headings I need a serif to work along with Benton Sans. I have tried various classics from my collection - Adobe Caslon, Baskerville etc – but It doesn’t seem right. Somehow they clash.

Can anyone suggest a serif to work along with Bentons Sans and Berthold City?

I’ve included the cover to give you an idea of the look.
